data.name: TS Marketplace: GP40-2 Mini Scenario Pack 02 Add-On
data.detailed_description:
Take the throttle of the powerful Electro-Motive GP40-2 diesel locomotive for challenging railroading in the intense and bustling Northeastern U.S., in High Iron Simulations’ GP40-2 Scenario Mini-Pack 02!

GP40-2 Scenario Mini-Pack 02 features Norfolk Southern and CSX action as you take the engineer’s seat aboard the 3,000-horsepower EMD GP40-2 and tackle authentic assignments on two popular Train Simulator routes, The NEC: New York – New Haven route; and the North Jersey Coast & Morristown Lines route

Based closely on actual railroad operations, the five career scenarios featured in GP40-2 Scenario Mini-Pack 02 put the highly successful and versatile GP40-2 to work in mainline freight, local, and switching duties!

Developed by noted scenario author Gary Dolzall and High Iron Simulations, GP40-2 Scenario Mini-Pack 02 will provide you with realistic and challenging railroading experiences amid the railroading hustle and bustling of the Northeastern U. S.

Note: GP40-2 Scenario Mini-Pack 02 requires the GP40-2 Loco Add-On and select scenarios require the Train Simulator NEC: New York – New Haven route and the North Jersey Coast & Morristown Lines route. Additional scenarios featuring the Western Pacific, Union Pacific, and D&RGW GP40-2 are also available and featured in the separately available GP40-2 Mini Scenario Pack 01.

Climb aboard for contemporary and challenging Norfolk Southern and CSX railroading – with GP40-2 Scenario Mini-Pack 02!

Included Scenarios


  • Browns Yard Bound
  • Norfolk Southern Local H-02
  • Oak Point Afternoon
  • Ballast Haul to Fresh Pond
  • SA-31 Northbound

Please Note: GP40-2 Loco Pack Add-On, NEC: New York-New Haven Route Add-On and North Jersey Coast & Morristown Lines Route Add-On are required, as separate purchases, in order to play the scenarios featured in this add-on.

data.short_description: Take the throttle of the powerful Electro-Motive GP40-2 diesel locomotive for challenging railroading in the intense and bustling Northeastern U.S., in High Iron Simulations’ GP40-2 Scenario Mini-Pack 02!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 7 / 8.1
  • Processor: 2.8 GHz Core 2 Duo (3.2 GHz Core 2 Duo recommended), AMD Athlon MP (multiprocessor variant or comparable processors)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB - 1GB with Pixel Shader 3.0 (AGP PCIe only)
  • DirectX®: 9.0c
  • Hard Drive: 40 GB HD space
  • Sound: Direct X 9.0c compatible
  • Other Requirements: Broadband Internet connection
  • Additional: Quicktime Player is required for playing the videos
  • Graphics: Laptop versions of these chipsets may work but are not supported. Updates to your video and sound card drivers may be required
  • Additional: Quicktime Player is required for playing the videos
